Background:
Am I over reacting? My boyfriend has not been supportive of me going on girls trips with certain friends because he doesn’t like their behavior. I stopped going on trips with that particular friend group a year ago because of his feelings about it. Fast forward to last night we’re sitting at dinner with his parents. We’re talking about scuba diving & his dad says well the best place he’s been is where his JOHN is going in two weeks, Belize. I haven’t heard about the trip at all. But I can’t help but feel if I planned an international trip with my recently divorced friend, yet hadn’t mentioned it to him, & he only found out from my dad he would’ve gone ballistic. I said have fun with whoever you’re going with & he blames me for over reacting & brings up how I went on trips with people he didn’t like (it’s been a year) then blames me for being toxic because of my snarky comments.
 Is this a fireable offense? Seems so shady!!
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Belize? Hmm.. that's news to me. My heart is pounding right now. Should I just go home?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "No I'll tell you my thoughts on it. Dad jumped the gun on something I mentioned and didn't know the details I'm shaking – I'm doing my best right now but you have some f***ing explaining to do."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I will Have a great trip with whoever she is. B? I don't care. I think if you're hiding things like that from me I should go home. That's not partnership."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Let me explain please before you way over react There's no girl going. Darren and I are in the process of booking a trip That's what I'm doing. Overreacting. For sure. What would you have to say?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I said let me explain because you accused me of taking another girl. I'm sure you'd be happy with me planning a trip without saying anything to you with similar company. Blame it on your dad?! Nice I am asking for you to discuss this before assuming the worst. I'd like to discuss this Have the best time"}]}

Background:
So I’m on holiday with the missus we are in Tunisia right now.
We decided to do some sort of Hammam Spa treatment which included a body massage. 
Anyway while the woman was massaging me, somehow I got an erection. 
My missus flipped. 

The woman massaging me wasn’t even attractive, I don’t know how it happened. I could tell it was happening about 20 seconds before it was showing and I was lying there trying to think the erection away. 
It didn’t work.

Background: Why would anyone in their right mind send their kids to school even if they thought it was an empty threat? It is better safe than sorry if everyone did show up, and this really did happen they would have felt pretty dumb.... The office lady was like "There really is no reason for him to stay home we have police here" The note clearly says police will die too, and them tried threatening me with an "un excused absence" because it's "ridiculous" he wasnt going to show up.... please if 3 quarters of the students didn't show up then there is a reason they didn't why even chance it during this time and age, and if it would have happened the parents of the victims would have wanted sympathy for the deaths of their kids when they were fully warned I am truly surprised anyone went to school today.... I am honestly not even wanting to send him to school the rest of the week because maybe they lied about the date just to have more police there to shoot them too would you send your child to school the rest of the week or play it safe?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Fuck the O.C. cops and fuck them so much on 10-28-25 When I show up with 2 others all of us with guns with mags that hold A(100)223 rounds and 4 time I set bombs--THINK THIS IS A JOKE AND you will see cops and kids die PS I like The Takers con bomb Love the 3 shit home man and girl"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Yall be careful"}]}

Background:
Hello, not sure if anybody wants an update, but I left. He was indeed cheating. I packed my things and I'm currently staying with a friend for now. I always knew that I had to leave, but it was one of the hardest thing to do. We met when I was 18, he was 19, both in college. 2 years later we started dating, graduated together, moved in and found out about the cheating. I went through his phone because I suspect he was hiding something so this is how I found out and confirmed he only did it the first 2 months. Of course this hurt very badly since prior to dating, we were friends for 2 years. I loved him so deeply that I didn't want to let go, I held on as long as I could. I never told my friends what happened until now, I was too ashamed. And now I'm suffering the consequences of my own mistakes, I never should have taken him back. And I know a lot of you guys will criticize me but he was my first of, and I truly loved him. I thought he could change so I gave him a second chance.
I'm 24 now, and I have a career, have friends and family that love me. Why should I waste the rest of my 20's on some guy that takes everything for granted? I think I already knew he was cheating when I posted this, but I just wanted that push that you guys gave me. Thank you.
Truly thank you, for the harsh words, the encouragement and the compassion. To anyone that is going through something similar, take my and everyone's advice, leave.
They never change, they just get better at hiding it.
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'm so excited for the weekend!"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Me too! What are you planning to do?"}]}

Background: I (18f) started talking to this guy (18m) that i matched with on a dating app a week ago. On sunday we went on a date which i think went pretty well. He even texted me afterwards to say he had fun and we immediately scheduled a second date for what was supposed to be today. We were gonna keep it simple and just watch the sunset. We chose the spot on sunday and it worked for me because i was already going to be in the area right before for my practice. So today he doesn’t text me at all, which is okay because i also get super busy. But at around 7, i sent him a quick text saying hey to see if it was still happening because i hadn’t heard from him at all. He ended up replying at 9, after the sun had set and said he forgot. AIO for being upset about this?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "what you up to? Nothing much just watching YouTube u?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "were we supposed to do something tonight? I lowkey forgot 💀 Anyways i would’ve been too tired I woke up early to go to the garage and get my car fixed We could do it whenever you’re free? I’m free every evening and ik tmr you have volleyball"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Anyways i would’ve been too tired I woke up early to go to the garage and get my car fixed that’s ok but a heads up would’ve been nice Alr sorry, I think I would’ve told you if I remembered"}]}

Background: I’m just in shock he makes so many rules and I follow them I work 50 hours a week I’m stuck living in a remote area with him for the next year and a half and I’m starting to go crazy. I get chronic headaches and laying down in the dark with my head back is the only thing I have found to help. He is trying to tell me I can only lay down for 30 min a day and wants me to schedule it into my day and tell him when I’m going to lay down at the start of the day but my headaches are spontaneous so it would be really hard to do this. I think he has a problem with needing control and when he does stuff like this I find it so hard to want to spend time with him, but then he freaks out when I don’t and gets more controlling. It’s really ruining my quality of life :( anyone have advice?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "My buddy said to mix almond flour and cheese and bake at 300 for 30 minutes to make great keto friendly crackers too. Can you please track how much time you are spending in your bed everyday this week onn bearable? Before I supported you to go in your room you said you were napping for 20 minutes a day... but it seems to me it is closer to 3 hour a day which when added to 9 hours sleep would mean you are sleeping 12 hours. Unless you can help me understand why this is good for you I would like to propose to use your alarm and limit time in the dark for one hour during the day. Lmk your thoughts and /or we can ask janna to advise. You can do your own research else please limit your time in the day and nap at the same time every day, 10:30-11:30 seems to be the max you should have. Reach out if you need more sleep."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Because I get headaches all the time and sitting in the dark listening to something to get my mind off the headache helps? And thanks for supporting me to get to you for advice. It's crazy that I get shit for being in bed all day."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I am thrilled that you listen to stories but only do it for 30 minutes a day in your room... unless you have a bad headache and need to be in the dark. Can you work with that? Xo"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Morn. I left all your media and 2 advice likely drop by this morning to see chance I leave you a text. I just reread your screenshot on scary stories. I have observed that you often fall asleep while you are listening to the stories lying down. With that in mind please pick a nap time once a day for max 30 minutes where you listen to them lying down (and sleep if you can)... also listen as often as you want the rest of the day but do it sitting up not in your bed to try and stop yourself from falling asleep. I can send an email to janna and cc you if you don't feel this is the best strategy to support your brain and mental health. Xoxoxo Can you please text me when you get up and I can call you and have a great day. I am going to costco today. Not a bad job cleaning last night thank you but I had wipe fridge, wipe table and counter by the phone and keep in mind that you have to wake up to listen to it for a whole day. I love you and I know how hard you are trying. Xo You also left cheese fridge open so it was all iced up this am. Wish I could fix the..."}]}

Background: the first ss is the bf and the second is my best friend, i haven't responded but i'm pissed. this guy is actually fucking racist and my friend is just standing by like nothing is wrong. i'm half vietnamese fyi, in the past though apparently this guy has said the n word multiple times and there's a picture of him (which i don't have) with a swastika, thumbs up and a smile. my friend showed and told me all of this with a smile and was laughing about it.. i awkwardly laughed it off but wtf i've never seen this side of her and i want to end the friendship.

Ik it ain't run but cameron wouldn't like it"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I'm on it"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Wanna see what it looks like so far???"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "sure"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I don't mind doing it just not having a good time rn yk what i mean"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "yea i get it , jus pray abt it"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Honestly I might cuz I can't find any way to fix my problem fr"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I feel like it's me"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Gods the answer, i understand im not a good example but he always help"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I think you're a pretty good example"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'm a bad person."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "What makes you think that?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I go against God, I wasn't like that"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "but i should be texting you i have a boyfriend"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "shouldn't *"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I go against God, I wasn't like that"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I do too I don't feel like it would be selfish of me to ask him for the answers if i go against him so much"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "not selfish , you jus need to repent. simply"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "but i should be texting you i have a boyfriend"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "You're entirely right I'll stop talking to you if you'd like"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "please"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "K I'm sorry"}]}

Background: I had plans to meet this guy I met on FB Dating for a date next week. He just dropped this crimson red flag on me. I’ve already gotten a second opinion so I’m pretty sure I’m not overreacting, but I thought this community might enjoy the daily dose of drama. Is there anything I could have done better or was this handled the best way I could have? Should I have given him the benefit of the doubt?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "So I have some confessions to make and will explain but if you don't like me anymore completely understand I used to do drugs real bad so I have hepatitis c which is curable and in the process of setting up an appointment to get treated and the other thing is that I am a sex offender. But I'm not a liar so I wanted to be up front about everything I'm not mad but this is something I need to think about and something we need to have a discussion about after I get off work. Before any of that though, elaborate on the sex offender part So I used to work at a nursing home and a girl I worked with had a problem with her coz I was gay and she wanted me to take care of her last resident so to be kind and hoping it would make her like me a little more I went in changed him and everything and didn't think nothing of it. Then I walked passed the office and heard my name and tape in my sentence so I walked in and was like what's going on and then I had to write a report on what happened and ended up being put in jail and waiting on trial for almost 2 years and my lawyer... but jail isn't fun so I was getting beat up and stuff in there coz I was gay and I told my lawyer I wanted to make a deal coz I couldn't stand to be in there anymore and that's how I became a sex offender. You got arrested because you changed a resident? No I got arrested because that girl lied on me"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "What did she say? I still don't know specifically what she said I just know she said I raped him which I didn't do That doesn't make any sense. They wouldn't just put you up for two years because of hearsay. They had to have evidence of some kind against you which would have been presented at your trial You would know exactly what was said about you too. That would've been presented word for word No it wasn't I was told nothing of the sort and she didn't even show up for court when everything was happening Listen I just wanted to be up front and honest with you I'm not trying to hide nothing otherwise I wouldn't have told you to begin with. Like I said before understand if you don't wanna have anything to do with me anymore. It was like almost 9 years ago it's in my past. You can believe me or not believe me that's completely up to you."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "If you had been fully honest with me I would have been in the position to make an informed decision about whether or not I can look past this red flag and take a chance on you. However, because you only told a half truth and lying about the evidence against you to make yourself look into the victim, I can see loud and clear that you aren't willing to take responsibility for your actions and that makes you dangerous still. Going forward I will have no further contact with you."}]}

Background: I was reading responses to the post and went kind of radio silent as I did text my mom and this is how it went. I was gaslit and it just fucking sucked. Believe me I know what the right choice is. Bash him to the rest of the family and cut them off. I got engaged on the trip we went on and before we left my mom and I looked at a wedding venue and when I told her my fiance popped the question she put a non refundable $2000 deposit down on the wedding venue. So either she is just fucked on that or she still has my wedding which I can’t see her doing if I never talk to her again. I did tell my dad and he’s furious. He can’t do much as he’s almost 70 years old and has suffered several strokes over the last few years. I just told him not to tell anyone and I would decide if I wanted to go that route but he told me to go to therapy. He said if I did lash out and commit a crime (popping his tires) my mom and stepdad both wouldn’t go to the police as I have evidence of his crime as well but to try and stay away from that. My mom and stepdad got together while my parents were still married and my stepdad was dating my auntie at the time and her son popped his tires so that also wouldn’t be very original of me. I’m just venting about other traumas now. Read the texts!
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Can you call me when you're by yourself I don't need anymore bad news. I've been stressed enough the last week."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Okay"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'm sorry but I cannot move on from what you did and I'm not going to be the black sheep of the family because of this whole thing. I am nauseous and it's not my fault. I'm seriously considering leaving him but I don't want to lose him again and I know you know that. I'm just never going to see any of the family again, my family and that's not fair. I'm trying to just forget it and I can't. Don't take it personally. You are taking it personally and I don't think it has anything to do with you. I think you were drunk. We"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "you. I think he was drunk. We talked and he is cutting back on his drinking. I know he feels terrible and he knows what he did was wrong and how he is perceived. Just give it some time. We have all done things we aren't proud of. We always get past them."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Time will not fix this. He never accepted me for who I am and I don't even think I would listen. So you're saying he's done this to other women before? He admitted that? Because you knowing that and staying with him is sickening. I know I'm not perfect but I come on. Being drunk is not an excuse for anything ever and I am one to know that. I have done bad things while intoxicated but never been a pervert - He raised me since I was 6 years old. This is so messed up. I have no idea if he's done this before. And he has been in inappropriate with you before? No. Because it has nothing to do with who he is personally and I know you were upset and I know you have"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "you are upset and I know you have lost respect. But I think you are overacting a bit. Take a break from us if you need to but let's not make this bigger than it is. You don't remember when we were camping and wife had to call both of us. I was upset but when I was wearing shorts because they were staring at my ass. Wife just made that point, that's not coming from me. You are under reacting! Ok. I'm under reacting. I am your daughter. I am your DAUGHTER! What do you want from me Again. It's not about you. It was stupid"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Okay Delivered"}]}

Background: So the conversation started out normal, she suggested cooking for us when she comes over to my place on Thursday. She proceeded to change her mind and go really cold while deciding what she should make. I can’t identify what I said that may have caused this & she won’t tell me. The only thing I can think of is suggesting to use the air fryer to cause less mess (last time she fried food she made a big mess with oil on the stove top but I didn’t mention it to her and cleaned it myself after she left). AIO for finding this weird and finding it even weirder she wouldn’t just talk it out? She was on her break at work so there was no actual reason to not just explain stuff to me.

I also have an air fryer if you want to use that for anything it's easier(er) to use than stove and shit I've been craving pasta recently too I like frying them sup, ou we can do pasta xxx wgt kindda pasta Im wishing u luck in the gym td Dont go too hard Chester cuddles and coffee will do te job We can do chicken parm, alfredo, spaggetti, bolonase or whatever uts called idk Any frying we should do in the air fryer just cause it's easier to clean after as well it doesn't get like oil all over the top of the stove from popping and stuff And I was craving like Alfredo or spaghetti I have been craving both idk lmk, Ill clean lmao lazy"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "K Acc rvm i dint wanna cook anymore boo u Have a nice day Bye What did I say? Did I say something that offended you Don't just say that and dip that's not very fair -/ Its fine just nvm At work ttyl I don't understand what I said that made you switch like that Can you just communicate instead of shutting me out like that it's gonna bother me the rest of the day Not my problem Alright"}]}

Background: I, F(22) met this guy (M22) from hinge. We’ve been talking for a couple months. have not met yet as he’s been out of state. He recently came back to the state I live in and just a few hours before this message, we were dating about scheduling a date. Then he sends this??? Im honestly so confused and feeling like I need to distance myself. It seems he doesn’t see the issue and I’m not sure how to explain it to him. Or is it just me who thinks it’s weird he’s trying to pass me off to his friend, while continually saying he is interested in me???
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Also I completely forgot but My friend thinks you’re cute (My phone was connected to apple carplay and your name popped up) he would like your snap but i wanted to ask you is it okay if I give it to him?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "As much as i appreciate the compliment, I’ll have to pass. It’s you who I’m interested in lol but lowkey this really is throwin me off, now I have no idea if you feel the same"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Oh you don’t have to worry about that, I’m interested in you, maybe even a little more than you are with me lol, I just wanted to ask instead of just handing it off without your consent"}]}

Background:
has anyone ever tried to open these gelatos that come from Satan himself? My girlfriend likes them and it takes a divine intervention to get one of these jars open. You can use a towel, you can use warm water, hell you could even use hulk himself and you wouldn’t even come close to twisting the lid off. ITS ONE SINGLE THREAD HOLDING IT ON. Who designed this shit. It’s practically impossible to do without giving up and getting a giant pair of pliers to open it. And at that point you’ve already burned off enough calories you woulda saved from eating it. I’ve heard stories that some people just cut open the jar because something as simple as a lid might as well be cemented on the thing. Then when you sit there squeezing and twisting for half an hour, losing all hope, you go for one more twist and it just comes off without any force at all. You then sit there feeling more defeated and the treat isn’t even worth it at that point. 

WHO IN THIS COMPANY DESIGNED THESE LIDS

AIO
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I love the new gelato flavors! Cookies & Cream is my favorite so far."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Thanks for sharing your thoughts! I'm glad you like it. Have you tried the other flavors?"}]}

Background: See screenshots!
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'm the oldest daughter of 5 (F:30) with my younger siblings being significantly younger than me ranging from 15-23 yrs old. It's important to note my role in the family is usually the third parent rather than a traditional sibling because of the age difference. Please keep that in mind as you read the situation:"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "One night I get a call from my oldest sister (22F) who is sobbing, and long story short... this 'big brother/uncle figure' was snap chatting her inappropriate things asking for essentially inappropriate photos and offering to send some to her. She was devastated and of course so was I. For context, he started spending time with our family when he started dating his wife, and my little sister was 10. Turns out he had done this in the recent past to my mom, his sister in law, and his wife's best friend (the ones we actually know about) where he was bold enough to go through with sending the unsolicited dick pics."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Fast forward a few months later, and he has suffered zero consequences. In fact, after a few conversations, my parents and his in laws seem to be moving about like nothing happened. Using phrases like 'men are just built differently...' I'm not one to hold a grudge... 'etc. This Christmas, I chose to opt out of our celebration with this chosen family, because I asked him not to be invited and of course he still was. I see it as enabling his predatory behavior and trying to protect my younger sisters, the one it happened to saying she was scared to be in his presence but didn't want to miss out on her other relationships within that family. Am I overreacting? I feel like I'm going crazy by wanting to completely sever this relationship with this man."}]}

Background:
I split with my ex last November. It was pretty amicable and we’ve had ups and downs since. At the moment we are in a period of no communication as I started dating last month. I got this today and I don’t know how to feel.

On one hand I had given her a gift/IOU to pay for a massage which she never cashed in and I know me at the time would want her to have it. On the other hand to just come out like this and ask years after the fact feels tactless and impersonal. 

I just wanna get sentiment of what other people are feeling as I know my interpretation of events in the past hasn’t always been in the majority. 

She’s usually extremely emotionally mature. Definitely more than me. So I feel like I’m missing something for why she’d ask so bluntly like this. Without any lead up
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Hey, hope you're having a good weekend. I just wanted to update you to let you know that I'll ask Julia on Tuesday because she's on vacation right now. I didn't get to ask her before because things have been really busy at work."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I don't know how to feel about this."}]}

Background: See the screenshots and see how lucky I am. I won a lottery and a car. Who wants a share? How do innocent people fall for this scam? He asked me to pay 500$ to claim the debit card on which 25M$ is loaded. Imagine those who fell for this. He sent me a FBI certificate of proof that they are aware about this lottery and he sent images of people holding the debit card in their hands.
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Hello Yug How are you doing this wonderful morning...?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I am good"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "That's great 😊"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I've been Trying to reach you for a while now"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Who are you?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I'm sure I don't need further introductions"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Mr. Mark I am humbled"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "How are you doing Today"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I've asked Couple of my staffs to reach out to you regarding Your winnings from Facebook Compensation program which has been going on for years"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Okay. How much have I won?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Ohh really we are sorry for the late information This promotional Lottery is being held once in every three years and it is aimed at saying a very BIG THANK YOU to all Facebook users making Facebook their number one means of communicating with friends and family Okay ?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Okay"}]}

Background:
Background: we were talking and said something to me that he thought was fine. I said I was hurt by his comment and that it was disrespectful. He doubled down that it’s not his fault that I am hurt, rather than acknowledge my feelings. The fight has spiraled since then.

So I get this text. Am I reading this right? I’m so lucky to have my husband and my three step kids because no man who truly knew me would be with me? This feels really fucked up, but maybe I’m overreacting?

Unrelated, but somewhat relevant: my husband has been unemployed for three years, I work hard to support our entire family, including the vacation we’re on right now.
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I know you’re not going to understand this at all, but it is so crystal clear to me how lucky you are to have us. I honestly can’t see any man that would finally get to your core and think it’s a great deal they got. Luckily, I’ve known you for enough time where I love you anyway."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Reading between the lines here... I’m lucky to have you because no one else would want me? And you \"love me anyway\"?"}]}
{"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "that sex we had was cool."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "A L.PEED."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "OK"}]}

Background: I should preface by saying that my daughter is 5 and my son is 3 and they always sleep in their own beds. I was in FaceTime with their dad tonight while getting them ready for bed (he works out of town most of the week so I’m doing this solo 5 days out of 7) so as I’m on the call with him he hears the kids say they want to sleep in the same bed and I honestly don’t see a problem with it so I said yes as long as they go straight to sleep and they agreed. As soon as he hears me tell them this he hangs up the call and doesn’t answer when I call him back and I texted him and I got the following messages from him. I get where he’s coming from but I’m with them 24/7 and I know what they watch (YouTube isn’t allowed at all) and I’ve never seen them try to do anything of any sexual matter not even when I sneak up on them so I have no reason to doubt that they won’t go straight to sleep. I don’t want to start putting that doubt in my head and have to start separating them now (I know I will have to in a few years but at this age I don’t think I should especially because they’re so close to each other). I don’t know what to think anymore.
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Why did you hang up Idk why you have the kids sleeping together. Wtf ate you doing?? Get them out of the same bed."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "If they were on the bed with me sleeping together it wouldn’t be a problem right? Whatever go to bed and leave me alone"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "No put Elsie in the bed with you. Put her brothers together. Wtf are you doing????"}]}

Background: So my friend and I made plans earlier in the week to hang out for dinner on Saturday. She texts me at noon on Saturday that she’s getting drinks with a friend and can we go out at 9. I didn’t think it was a big deal and said sure. Then it gets pushed to 9:30, then 10, then 11. I added the screenshots so you can see the timeline. But I sat in my car outside the bar for 1.5 hours and then went home.( I shouldn’t have waited so long but I’ve been having a really tough time and was SO excited for this/ spent ages getting ready) We’ve been friends for 10 years, she’s never been THIS bad with timing. We’ve also never really argued. I was frustrated because I wasted my Saturday night after declining invitations to see other people. I just feel like? She pushed me to the side for her other friend. And I just drove home and cried. I feel so alone and unimportant.
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'll be like 9:45! Omg sorry can we do 10"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Sure!"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Do you wanna meet us here idk wbxy time we'll be done we are getting one more drink."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Sure, where are you?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Don't hate me I feel like I'm just venting Can we meet at 11 pm for sure and maybe it'll be a good time when there's more people"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Girl I'm already in 😔"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Omg sorry I was getting a tarot card reading"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Okay me ans 😔"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "We are going to dabral really quick I'm going to tell her she had plans and you'll be meeting us"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I'm already in"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'm at a speakeasy Inside an Italian restaurant, it's called Sorry give me like 20 mins pls don't hate me I'm sooooo sorry I'm so bad at time"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Girl it's fine but sitting in my car by for an hour sucks"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Are we meeting at 11?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Yes do you wanna come to this bar?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Honestly no I thought we were going to this bar and he been sitting here for an hour ; I think I'm just going to go home"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Edited"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Sorry don't hate me I'll be there in 20"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I'm driving home"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Don't hate me I'm so sorry I can come to your house if you want"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "For what?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Are you mad ?((("}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I know I f***ed up I'm so sorry"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I feel like I'm always pretty chill about being late/Plan changes but truthfully I'm really upset about tonight. I declined other plans just to sit in my car for over an hour already waiting an hour because you pushed it back, while you bailed on me for someone else. I had a really bad week and I just needed my friend, but clearly I'm not a priority to you"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "You are a priority, and I know that I've done this many times of overbooking plans bc I think things will work out and then they don't and they blow up in my face, just like the third ody. Knowing and thinking that hang outs with 🤔 are usually short bc she calls the night short, really thought that was going to be the case again"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "And it wasn't, she had a lot on her mind and I was just trying to be a good friend then we got tarot card read and got another drink and it just took longer and again it kinda just blew up in my face"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "And I'm so sorry 🤧 don't want you to think that I'm not prioritizing you I just need to be better and not making so many plans it's all going to work out you know that I'm cheerful and love you and I just have a lot of bad habits and issues I need to work on"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "You knew I was in 🚗 and set there for 1.5 hours and you still never told me you had to go. Obviously spending time with her was more important and you should have told me. You just kept saying 20 minutes and then not showing up. So that doesn't really feel like being prioritized"}]}

Background:
so lately, every time i show or tell my best friend about something, she seems to find something wrong about it, or something she can complain about.

a few examples:

i am writing a book, and i was joking around and accidentally came up with an author signature. i showed her, and her immediately response was “EW?? WHAT IS THAT!!” over FaceTime. i thought it was pretty cool, so i was a little disheartened!

i wrote a short story, published it, and she told me that is didn’t make sense and it was too hard to read. and then proceeded to tell me it should have gone in a different direction. which FINE! i’ll take criticism, but i’ve had multiple other people come to me and tell me they loved it, and they understood it just fine??

i got an inflatable costume for halloween since we hope to have more trick or treaters this year, so i facetimed her to show her, and she gave me a look of disapproval and told me it was a waste of money and it was extremely stupid. like yeah, was it necessary? no? but i think the kids will love it!

then tonight, icing on the cake, i posted a picture on my insta story of the baked mac and cheese i made, and she texted me a screenshot and circled the bit of cheese i had spilled on the stove????? like im just proud of the hour it took me to make :/

there are a lot more examples than this, but 3 of them happened just this week. i feel like your best friend is supposed to be your biggest supporter and she GENUINELY feels like my biggest hater. and i know this is all trivial, but it seems to be every time i talk to her, and i feel like i cant go to her with anything anymore without being judged.

picture is of the text she sent me tonight :/
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "worth it though!!"}]}

Background: These are left in the iron fence around a K-6 grade school. In Dorchester mass. Amitabh for collecting up propoganda?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "God Bless AMERICA Righteousness exalteth a Nation: but sin is a reproach to any people. Proverbs 14:34 KJV"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "All the drugs, sex, partying, and alcohol will never fill the void inside... Only a personal relationship with Jesus Christ will truly satisfy you!"}]}

Background: TLDR: One of my closest friends (X) has beef and burnt bridges with someone i used to have beef with (Y) except ive forgiven her. I told her to try to tolerate Y but X didnt like that at all. Ive been trying to rebuild me and Y’s friendship after an incident where i cut ties for about 5-6 months but X obviously doesn’t like that
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Ik you're probably asleep rn, but there was something that you said to me tonight that ended up pissing me off. I know you said it to probably encourage me to release some of my anger, but to me it was upsetting. I don't want to colour what I can say as being offensive but I can say that I can't acknowledge her and go about my day. I want to completely eliminate her from my life. I know that if I simply let the small routine of just saying 'hello' continue, we will inevitably keep adding on. It is the same thing with [redacted]. We said no contact, but then he'd say 'hello', and I'd say back. He'd start small talk and go back and forth with him only for things to get out of hand once more. I don't want that with [redacted] because I'm putting my foot down. I know I can be a push over in other aspects of my life but this is different because I'm so [redacted] with people I don't want to interact with trying to act like things are normal. I. Don't. Want. To. Talk. To. Her. At. All. Not even a hello. If she is nearby then I will completely and utterly ignore her because I'm setting my boundaries which she herself can CLEARLY NOT do with [redacted] despite him being manipulative throughout their relationship."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "So tldr: I don't want to talk to [redacted] and I never will because I'm tired of doing what people tell me to do because they all think I'm the one being dramatic. And I wouldn't be surprised if she was your Spy So tldr: I don't want to talk to [redacted] and I never will because I'm tired of doing what people tell me to do because they all think I'm the one being dramatic. And I wouldn't be surprised if she was your Spy No one over in that group talks with you frequently enough to exchange details like that so out of the blue, especially when this was the first instance of me being over there in a long [redacted] time. I'm just [redacted] pissed"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I'm sorry for that. I get now that it was stupid of me to tell you to tolerate her especially after the whole ordeal you guys had. It was a lapse in judgement considering I had been talking with her earlier that day. I promise won't ever say anything along those lines again. My issue however, and I still get your pov, (because you told me in the past) is that just because you are choosing to cut ties with her because of your beef, doesn't mean you have to force me to cut ties. During O yesterday, I was talking with her and whatnot and she looked away for a second and you dragged me by the arm. I've forgiven her of the mall incident because it was almost a year ago and I lowkey don't care anymore (as messed up as it was) and if we were dating then I would understand dragging me away but we're not and that's the issue. Obviously we are very close and I care about you but I'm trying to rebuild the bridge instead of burning it. I get she hurt you with the whole [redacted] thing among other reasons but the reason I said to tolerate was solely so I don't have to pick a side between you too. Again I get it was stupid but that was my thought process (edited) But I won't say it again and you can carve that into stone I'm sorry truly"}]}

Background:
Brief history about me. I worked at my last job for 2 years and worked my way up to management, this last year i transfered to Michigan from New Jersey and have been here since March. I got offered to work at a Car Wash and make way more money. I voiced concerns about culture difference as im super proud and happy of the culture I had at my last work place and how its a huge stepping stone for me to leave there. They reassured me and were super kind and helpful. I get hired, decide to take the opportunity and ive been here 2 and a half weeks now. 

Today was my last day. I started off in a management role, was trying to get to learn the team and how to do the job. I had very minimal training and taught myself a lot, there were times in my first week I was the only management on site and barely knew what was going on. I was asking questions to learn stuff, and when they got back I ran over what I did to see if it was right and they said yes. At the end of every shift they thanked me and told me I was doing great. 

One day my manager texts me saying im going to be at another location a few miles away because my training is now over. My first day at the new location, he comes to the location and said come talk to me. What's been going on? I said jobs great and I love it, feel like im adapting well and learning a lot. And he says well we have an issue and that's why I moved you here. I asked what was the issue? He said the manager there didnt see any leadership from me and wasn't looking for my style of management. And that there was an incident. 

HOW HE HEARD THE STORY: Me, A manager, and another guy were in the booth. I brought up my past how "back in jersey I was the token white kid grew up around black people and said the n-word" and it made the woman manager uncomfortable so here we are.

HOW THE STORY UNFOLDED: me, a manager and a WHITE guy were in the booth. He said something something n***a. He looked at me and said, im sorry, I grew up in detroit. I responded with you're okay. Ive heard it plenty when I lived in New Jersey. He said oh so you grew up in the hood? I said i wouldn't really say the hood but I was definitely one of the token white kids growing up. It was mainly black, Hispanic and middle eastern where im from. He said oh cool that's wassup. And then we got cars and dispersed.

I defended myself and asked what he meant about my leadership as I felt I took on a lot for being new and was making sure shit was running and getting done as efficiently as I could and I feel like judging my work on a week worth of work isnt necessarily fair. Plus everyone knows what to do so there hasn't been any need for me to get people moving. The bell goes off and everyone disperses to do their job. There have been times im the only one around and make sure shits done. Plus every day the manager says how great ive been doing. If she doesnt tell me what im doing wrong, how can I improve? And also I never said the n-word. I was asked a question about my past and I answered it. But yes, I grew up around black people. (I didnt snitch on guy that actually said it cuz im not like that) 

His response was well people would follow a man of your stature, you just have to tap into the strict side and lead with some fear. We cant have our managers too friendly with the staff and getting super personal. I moved you here to give you another chance, if you fail me again I'll demote you down to line work. Just be more conserved and dont share so much.

Which I dont even know wtf he means with the stature. But I felt like the disrespect was more towards my friends I grew up with more than towards me. Cuz I also noticed after this convo I have only worked with white people in management. 

So I said, Okay. You got it. Apologies. Won't let it happen again. So now at this new gig all i did is talk work and if anyone asked anything personal I gave half assed dry responses.

Today I get to work and the new manager im working with hands me a line worker shirt and said to wear that instead of my production super shirt. I said why? He said Manager said he talked to you yesterday did he not? I said no he didnt and he said oh well he didnt really give me a reason why but told me to give you a line worker shirt because you got demoted. I talked to him on the phone and asked what about the second opportunity? He says the opportunity was that he didnt fire me and im still able to work for the company. I hung up, left site and sent him this text. AIO?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I just feel like measures are a bit extreme. I definitely realize where I messed up. But I gave up a lot leaving [redacted] for a much more promising opportunity even though I could have been set with [redacted]. I was willing to break off and explore new stuff and you were willing to give me a chance."}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Meanwhile I still don't fully understand the too friendly with staff. Who would want to follow someone they don't know? Besides that you have Production Supers dating MSA's and others talking about doing and selling drugs on top of other things. I won't name names because im not like that. But I mention where I grew up and something that happened and suddenly its an issue? But I don't need any answers, its all good."}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Sincerely appreciate the offer and opportunity. But I don't think our management styles will work well together. I feel disrespected and don't feel this culture you praise. This isn't going to be a fit for us i don't believe. Have a great one."}]}

Background: My boyfriend (M23) quit his job about 2 months ago due to the toxicity of the work place, being overworked, and underpaid. He didn’t have a different job lined up and has been jobless ever since. The first month he was pretty depressed about it and took time to rest, relax, destress, sleep and cope so he wasn’t searching for a new job which I totally understand. However the second month is almost over and he is still jobless. He was offered a job for a brand new place in August, but that’s months away and he has no money or savings  my at all right NOW. He complains about how he has no money for anything, not for food, not for rent, not for gifts or dinner for our anniversary in a couple of days, but is being picky about finding a temporary job until August. He only is looking for opening at spots that he is familiar with and that have to do with his occupation and has barely put any effort into looking at those places. I understand he WANTS to stay in the this specific industry even as a temporary job, but he NEEDS money and as a responsible adult he should be able to put his ego aside and sacrifice his wants for his needs, getting a quick easy temporary job isn’t hard there are soooo many listings and even if it’s a job he doesn’t want to do it’s TEMPORARY because he needs money NOW! He says that it’s too late to even get a temporary job because rent is due in a week and he won’t get a paycheck from a new job in time which is true BUT ITLL GET HIM MONEY IN THE FUTURE. Idk how to help him or what to do now. Am I being an asshole? I’m just trying to help.
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I think I'm gonna have to sell my cello What's that IM DEAD I'm retarded I mean u don't play it It's just been sitting around Does it hold sentimental value? It's supposed to be my heirloom It's my instrument I was supposed to keep till I die I don't play it because I don't have a space that I can play it at full volume"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Aw They don't go for much so I don't think it's worth it Ur doing everything but working to get money babe"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "It's probably worth 10k and that's the only thing that can help me stay afloat It's from 1856 baby it's worth a lot It's not that hard to get a quick pic up job I don't have the two or three weeks I need for the money to start coming through again rent is due in a week exactly m I'm calling a shop to bring in an appraiser Exactly y u should've gotten it weeks ago I've been jobless for like 2 months Thank you baby U don't get upset that I'm pointing out the obvious U don't get my pity im ng! Like I love u"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "But like I said yesterday But I'm not doing what needs to be done to help ur situation Sfru U aren't taking it as serious as it is Idk why I speak to you about this shit you love to be an asshole I'm not being an asshole I've been trying to help u figure out how to fix ur situation and like u have our whole relationship u ignore my advice and just sulk about ur situation that has an easy solution ur just not willing to commit to And I don't understand how someone in such a situation can realize the severity of it and not do what needs to be done to change it You are so unhelpful really you are"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Lmao okay I've been looking at jobs for u Giving u advice Even my MOTHER has looked for jobs for u I've tried to be understanding But it's been 2 months How would u like me to be helpful? I feel the only way I can be 'helpful' to u now is just giving u the money Idk how to help u, im not sure why maybe its another way of self sabotage, but u don't take ur problems by the horns and deal with them, u just sit in them and wallow, if u have problems and r able to recognize them, acknowledge them, think about ways to fix them, and then ACT on those solutions that either uve come up with or someone else that's trying to help u (like me) has come up with There's only so much I can do to help u U have to help urself And that's not something I see u doing U call me an asshole and unhelpful which sucks obviously because what I trying to do IS help. U had time to sulk, and u have been saying how tight on money u r and how ur stressing financially and how the babies aren't going to have a place to live soon and u cry about it and uve said u have to get a job in the meantime while the other restaurant is getting built and put together but ur being picky about finding a job I understand u WANT to stay in the food industry but u NEED money and as a responsible adult u should be able to put ur ego aside and sacrifice ur wants for ur needs, getting a quick easy job isn't hard there are soooo many listings and even if it's a job u don't want to do it's TEMPORARY bcuz u need money NOW this is something I've BEEEEENNNNNN saying to u and u wait until the last minute when rent is due in a week and u don't have any money I'm sorry u think im an asshole, unhelpful, and want me to shut the fuck up."}]}

Background:
So i  had this friend, whom i talked to for a year, because we played same games and shared interests but because he started joking offensive gay jokes and mocking me. i was fed up w him i decided to end friendship because he didnt acknowledge my frustration or try to understand why i was hurt.  it didnt help so i blocked him. Week after week i received texts from his alt accounts, he usually pretended to be someone else but i kept blocking. 
So 1 month after he went quiet so i thought he moved on but tonight i received another friend request and he pretended to be buyer for my game account ? I posted an AD on reddit, but i never gave him my reddit profile ?? I was genuinly scared today when he revealed himself

He doest live in my area, but this is horrible feeling of being traced online ?? 

I dont undersrand what he wants from me, is he just lonely or weirdo. Why he would be a friend with someone who he judges and dont approve their lifestyle ?
Transcription: {"messages": [{"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Hello! You sell accounts for HSR?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "Hello, yes"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "How much is it for one?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I'm sorry, but did you see my post on Reddit? I posted 2 hsr accounts for sale (edited)"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "I have find it is the one with blade good?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "hm"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "European?"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "yes"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Yes all characters can clear MoC (edited) pure fiction and other content phainon has his complete premium team"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I see, for the pay, you can hold it on my paycheck, boss"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Kept you waiting, uh? I played you like a damn fiddle am I right"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "I'm scared of you don't text me"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Why scared"}, {"speaker": "Speaker B", "text": "u unhealthy"}, {"speaker": "Speaker A", "text": "Hey I've been preparing for one month now"}]}
